text: is a soft and fluffy steamed rice cake
with coconut flavor with a top bloom
layer of flour let's learn how to make
it
you will need 170 grams of rice flour 20
grams of tapioca starch 100 grams sugar
200 ml coconut milk 2 eggs 2 tbsp
vanilla extract half a teaspoon of cream
of tartar 1 3 spoon salt first combine
50 grams of sugar with 250 ml of coconut
milk in a small saucepan stir and cook
over medium heat until the sugar is
completely dissolved turn off the heat
and leave to cool next in a large bowl
combine 170 gram of rice flour 20 gram
tapioca starch and 1 3 spoon salt add
the coconut mixture and stir well
add vanilla extract and stir to combine
separate the yolks and combine the egg
whites in a large bowl beat with a hand
mixer until big bubbles appear then add
half a teaspoon of cream of tartar
continue beating over high speed until
the bubbles appear smaller and smaller
gradually add 50 grams of sugar and
continue beating when you lift off the
bitter and that white can stand up
straight that is when it reaches heart
peak stop eating add the egg whites into
the flour mixture in three additions
using folding technique to mix up the
batter gently until homogeneous
continue with the other two additions
and continue folding until you get a
homogeneous batter
next grease the mold with some vegetable
oil to prevent sticking i use a small
and high tea cup like this fill the cup
almost full with the butter gently tap
the cup on the counter to release the
big bubbles dip a knife into vinegar and
score a line across the surface
wipe off the egg white on the knife and
dip it into vinegar again and make
another score on the surface of the
butter to make a plus size this will
help the rice cake to bloom better when
finished scoring steam the cake
immediately
for about 12 to 15 minutes depending on
the size of the mold do not open the lid
during this 15 minutes and wrap the lid
of your steamer in a kitchen towel to
prevent the water from dipping into the
cakes
look at the beautiful petals you can
enjoy the cakes when they are still hot
to adore the fluffiness and the
beautiful flavor it's so soft and fluffy
inside with amazing flavor of coconut
milk just a beautiful and tasty rice
cake but you should totally give it a
try
i wish you success and please send me a
photo if you give it a try thank you for
watching see you then next time bye
[Music]
you
